amendment.description: Amendment provided for consideration of emergency evacuation routes in the risk-based prioritization for replacement or rehabilitation of deficient bridges.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in part B of House Report 110-760 to consider emergency evacuation routes in the risk-based prioritization for replacement or rehabilitation of deficient bridges.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, M..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, M. amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
